mapper.select: SELECT ID as id, ORDER_ID as orderId, DELAY as delay, PARTY_ID as partyId, GOOD_INFO as goodInfo, SELLER_ID as sellerId, COUNT as count, AMOUNT as amount , STATUS as status FROM T_MALL_ORDER_TASK WHERE STATUS = #{status} AND DELAY <= #{date} ORDER BY ID LIMIT #{page.pageNo},#{page.pageSize}
